item.title: A reporter used AI to apply to 2,843 jobs
item.description:
AI is spamming up job applications. 404 Media’s Jason Koebler writes about how he used a free tool, AI Hawk, to apply for 17 jobs in an hour while working a restaurant shift — only stopping when he’d reached 2,843. The tool automatically entered Koebler’s bio info, generated resumes, wrote customized cover letters, and checked […]

Shop the best home security camera deals still live after October Prime Day, including SimpliSafe and Arlo models
item.description: Home security systems and video doorbells are on sale at Amazon after October Prime Day, including tons of Arlo products.

item.title: Where to preorder the PlayStation 5 Pro
item.description: Sony's upcoming PlayStation 5 Pro console is up for preorder at Amazon, Best Buy, GameStop, Target, and Walmart for $699.99 as of 10 a.m. ET on Oct. 10. It's set for release on Nov. 7.
